Label: Event 1
Value: Michelangelo returns to his native Florence to begin work on the statue David.

Label: Event 2
Value: Spain defeats France at the Battle of Cerignola. Considered to be the first battle in history won by gunpowder small arms.

Label: Event 3
Value: Dutch East India Company is dissolved.

Label: Event 4
Value: Portuguese navigator Pedro Álvares Cabral claims Brazil for Portugal.

Label: Event 5
Value: Ōnin War takes place in Japan.
